Headline: #3 King Drive Temporary Reroute near King Drive/79th
ShortDescription: 3 King Drive buses temp. rerouted SB: King Dr., 76th, Lafayette and 79th ; NB: King Dr., 79th, State and 76th: due to, street blockage near King Drive/79th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#3 King Drive buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near King Drive/79th due to street blockage.

Southbound buses will operate via King Drive, 76th, Lafayette and 79th including the normal route streets at the beginning and end.

Northbound buses will operate via King Drive, 79th, State and 76th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #30 South Chicago Temporary Northbound Reroute near 130th/Avenue O
ShortDescription: Northbound 30 South Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted via Baltimore. 134th and Avenue O: due to, street blockage near 130th/Avenue O.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound  #30 South Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted via Baltimore. 134th and Avenue O: due to, street blockage near 130th/Avenue O.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
